      • getCommandLineOptions

        public String[][] getCommandLineOptions()
        Description copied from class: KVImplementation
        Get the command line options supported by this implementation, suitable for display in a usage help message.

        There must be at least one option, to indicate that this implementation is to be used.

        Specified by:
        getCommandLineOptions in class KVImplementation<MVStoreKVImplementation.Config>
        Returns:
        array of pairs: { option, description }

      • parseCommandLineOptions

        public MVStoreKVImplementation.Config parseCommandLineOptions(ArrayDeque<String> options)
        Description copied from class: KVImplementation
        Parse the specified command line options and return the resulting configuration, if possible.

        At least one option must be recognized, indicating that this implementation is to be used, otherwise null should be returned.

        Specified by:
        parseCommandLineOptions in class KVImplementation<MVStoreKVImplementation.Config>
        Parameters:
        options - all command line options; upon return, recognized options should be removed
        Returns:
        configuration object representing the parsed options, or null if this implementation is not specified/configured

      • createKVDatabase

        public MVStoreKVDatabase createKVDatabase(MVStoreKVImplementation.Config config,
                                          KVDatabase ignored1,
                                          AtomicKVStore ignored2)
        Description copied from class: KVImplementation
        Create an KVDatabase using the specified configuration.
        Specified by:
        createKVDatabase in class KVImplementation<MVStoreKVImplementation.Config>
        Parameters:
        config - implementation configuration returned by parseCommandLineOptions()
        ignored1 - required KVDatabase; will be null unless KVImplementation.requiresKVDatabase(C) returned true
        ignored2 - required AtomicKVStore; will be null unless KVImplementation.requiresAtomicKVStore(C) returned true
        Returns:
        new KVDatabase instance

      • createAtomicKVStore

        public MVStoreAtomicKVStore createAtomicKVStore(MVStoreKVImplementation.Config config)
        Description copied from class: KVImplementation
        Create an AtomicKVStore using the specified configuration.

        The implementation in KVImplementation invokes createKVDatabase() and constructs a AtomicKVDatabase from the result. Implementations that natively support the AtomicKVDatabase interface should override this method.

        Overrides:
        createAtomicKVStore in class KVImplementation<MVStoreKVImplementation.Config>
        Parameters:
        config - implementation configuration returned by parseCommandLineOptions()
        Returns:
        new AtomicKVStore instance

        Returns:
        human-readable description
